dcterms:description: MS-COCO is a static image dataset widely used for various tasks, including multi-label image recognition, object localization, and semantic segmentation. It contains approximately 82K images for training, 41K for validation, and 41K for testing, with an average of 2.9 labels per image.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:creator: G. A. Sigurdsson

A. Farhadi
I. Laptev
A. Gupta
dcterms:description: Charades is a multi-label video dataset containing around 9.8K videos, with an average of 6.8 labels per video. It includes 157 action labels and 66.5K annotated activities, making it suitable for multi-label video classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Charades
